questions.question: For a system with single pole on the real-axis (and no zeros)

answers.a: The system with pole in (0,1) acts as a low pass filter
answers.b: The system with pole in (0,1) acts as a high pass filter
answers.c: The system with pole in (-1,0) acts as a low pass filter
answers.d: The system with pole in (-1,0) acts as a high pass filter
